Used by older applications (like INV Backoffice) to make SFTP file push calls using modern ciphers (utilizing private key only). Remotepath will be created if it doesn't exist on the destination SFTP folder.

Sample JSON:

{
"remotePath":"/WS01/",
"host":"localhost",
"user":"sftp2467support",
"port":22,
"privateKeyString":"",
"fileName":"WS01_Sheet_20251119041622_AutoClosedAccounts.csv",
"fileBase64":""
}

API Post: http://localhost:5144/Sftp/upload-json
